about_the_game:
The Jiang Shi 2: Curse of Soul "is an independent game that combines traditional Chinese Taoism with supernatural elements, innovatively introducing Russian roulette gameplay, making every battle full of variables and excitement. The immersive first person perspective, thrilling plot, and rich environmental interactions make this game a dual challenge of thought and courage. If you dare to face your inner fears and challenge the impermanence of fate, then this game will be your best choice.

Immersive gaming experience

Players will personally take on the role of a female Taoist and immerse themselves in the tense atmosphere of yin-yang fighting. This game adopts a first person perspective, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in the tense and oppressive atmosphere.

Classic Russian roulette style gameplay

In order to increase the challenge and immersion of the game, this game combines the "Russian roulette" mechanism, where each round of choices is full of unknowns and risks. You not only have to deal with enemy attacks, but also face inner fears and doubts. Through multiple decisions, you will face choices on the brink of life and death, testing your strategy and psychological resilience.

Rich plot and multiple endings

According to the player's choice, the game will present multiple different endings. Can you successfully stop your junior sister, or will you ultimately succumb to the demon path? Every decision is crucial.
